description: This Kotlin source file defines the VideosRowAdapter class, which is a RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying a list of Video objects in a RecyclerView. It manages view holder creation, data binding, focus states, and user interaction handling for video items in an Android TV application.

classes.name: VideosRowAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for managing a list of videos in a RecyclerView, handling focus, selection, and binding video data to UI components.

classes.name: VideosRowAdapter.VideoVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to the UI elements of a video item view and provides a method to update focus visuals.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item view layout and creates a new VideoVH instance.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds video data to view holder, sets focus change listener, key listener, and manages focus visuals and animations.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of videos.

methods.name: setFocusedIndex
methods.description: Updates the focused video index and refreshes the list display.
